http://www.egroups.com/chat/nbwrpg

Go here for your petty bickering.  Quit using the board space. No one 
wants to half to read it any more. Please guys, just go to the chat 
room and hash it out. No more name calling, ok? Come on you guys, 
this nonsence is not helping the RPG, which is why we are here to 
begin with.  OK? Go to the chat room and argue. Thank you.

Logo.
